text: Narasimha Rao or Narasimharao is an Indian surname. It may refer to: * P. V. Narasimha Rao (1921–2004), ninth prime minister of India * Garikapati Narasimha Rao (born 1958), Telugu writer and avadhani * Kovvali Lakshmi Narasimha Rao (1912–1975), Indian novelist * Panuganti Lakshminarasimha Rao (1865–1940), Telugu writer * Sistla Venkata Lakshmi Narasimha Rao (1911–2006), senior advocate and trade union activist * Sthanam Narasimha Rao (1902–1971), Indian stage artist * Vinjamuri Venkata Lakshmi Narasimha Rao (1887–?), Indian stage actor and Telugu-Sanskrit pandit == See also == * Narasimharao Pet, a neighbourhood of Eluru, Andhra Pradesh * Narasimha (disambiguation)
title: Narasimha Rao
